newsitem.title: POLAND: Poland offers PLN 700 mln 10-yr bonds on April 8.
newsitem.headline: Poland offers PLN 700 mln 10-yr bonds on April 8.

text.p: Poland offered 400 million zlotys of 10-year bonds maturing on April 18, 2007 and 300 million of 10-year bonds due on April 18, 2006 at a primary tender on April 8, the central bank said.
The value date for the auction is April 17, 1997.
